mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, title, body, mno, id, wdate FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rno , bno, title, body, mno, id, wdate FROM ( SELECT fbno bno, title, body, mno, id, wdate FROM fileboard f, member m WHERE writer = mno AND f.isshow = 'Y' ORDER BY wdate DESC ) ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{startRno} AND #{endRno}
SELECT count(*) FROM fileboard WHERE isshow = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fileboard(fbno, title, body, writer) VALUES( fbrdseq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{body}, ( SELECT mno FROM member WHERE id = #{id} ) )
